amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the Department of Justice from interfering with state cannabis programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the Department of Justice from interfering with state cannabis programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 267 - 165 (Roll no. 370).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 267 - 165 (Roll no. 370).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
